"Valentine" is a single by British recording artist Jessie Ware and English keyboardist and singer, Sampha.
The single was released as a digital download and as a limited edition 12" heart-shaped vinyl on 14 February 2011.
Music video
The music video for "Valentine" was directed by Marcus SÃ¶derlund.
